channel.title: Brutal-PK - Death is Brutal #1 come hybrid
channel.description:

[FONT=Comic Sans MS][B]Ok so I decided to start a instant PK type of server again, under the name 'Brutal-PK'. Feel free to come and join us, even though we don't have forums yet we're #1.[/B][/FONT]
